name: AloeCareHealth
0:
”Alexa, open aloe care”
”Alexa, ask aloe care for an update”
”Alexa, ask aloe care about my dad”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: aloe care
Developer Terms of Use
des: Use our Alexa Skill to check in on your Aloe Health account easily and quickly. This skill gives you information about your loved one, recent check-ins, the home's temperature, air quality and more.
